result.eng: They were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ga: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.orig: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.html: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ponchtml: Liosta le háireaṁ a ḃí iontu tráṫ den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
